name: Idolatrous Image
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
In a flash of lightning, you create any image of your choosing anywhere within range, and select what creatures are unaffected by this spell. Every other creature that can see it must succeed on an Intuition saving throw or be blinded for the duration. The only thing they can see is the image.

A creature that takes damage can repeat the saving throw at the end of their next turn. On a success, they are no longer blinded.
